title: 關聖帝君一百籤第七十三籤
subtitle: 王昭君憶漢帝辛丙

analysis.zh: 這首詩的主題是…描寫昔日的情誼被時光撕碎，現已變成無音無訊，痴心等待仍未能結成連理，揭示了關係的破裂與失望。
analysis.en: 這首詩的主題是…The poem reflects the disintegration of a once‑vivid love. It begins with a recollection of a shared promise, then shows how the connection has vanished, leaving only unreturned messages. The narrator's longing to unite in marriage remains unrealised, highlighting the bitterness of an unfulfilled bond.
analysis.jp: この詩のテーマは…かつての約束を思い出し、現在は音信不通となった悲しい恋の断絶を描いている。結び付きたいという執念は叶わず、関係の破綻と失望が表れている。
analysis.reference: 昭君。歸州人。漢元帝宮女。會匈奴求婚。昭君詣闕上書請行。既嫁單于。其心未嘗忘漢。嘗上漢帝書曰。臣妾幸得備禁臠。以為身依月日。死有餘芳。豈料失意丹青。遠竄絕域。命也。奈何妾有父有弟。願君王憐而愛之。

rag_analysis:
According to the poem, the core meaning is:
• The speaker remembers a former promise that was cut in half, hinting at a broken bond.
• The sudden loss of communication (“信音乖”) portrays a fading relationship.
• The lingering hope of becoming a united couple (“成連理”) is shown as futile.
• The last line underscores that even an attempt to reconcile will end in discord, highlighting a doomed fate.
